# XmlAttributeExtensions.IsNamespaceDeclaration method

Determines if the attribute is a namespace declaration.

```csharp
public static bool IsNamespaceDeclaration(this XmlAttribute @this)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| this | The XmlAttribute to determine if it is a namespace declaration. |

## Return Value

Returns `true` if the attribute is a namespace declaration; otherwise, `false`.
